input_text.Response A: This attractive poster reprint is of a magician pulling roses out of top hat surrounded by supernatural beings from 1892. The poster is printed at 16 x 24 in. on high quality, non-glossy photo paper. The print is a high quality, non-glossy photo paper. The poster is printed at 16 x 24 in. on high quality, non-glossy photo paper. This poster is an attractive reproduction of the original poster.
